maps.name: Top
labels: A large statue of a farmer and his child stands outside the entrance to Pleasant Veg

maps.name: Basement
labels: Store Room: Stairs lead down to a dark store room, containing several crates of various fruit and veg. In the far left corner a secret doorway is hidden by a shelf

Altar Room: A large room with a blood altar to the left. Trails of blood lead over to a furnace in the right. Around the furnace are piles of bones and two stone slabs, one of which holds a warpped body
Jail Cell: A small, dirty, jail cell. All it contains is: a bed roll; a bucket of water and some old chains secured to the wall

Cave: In the basement wall is the mouth of a cave, emitting an eerie purple light. To the right of the entrance is a large pile of bones. To the left is a blood altar, with a human head sitting on it. Purple liquid runs out from underneath the alter and into a section of the cave containing several Zalg plants
